import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux'; import { MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline, MdDelete, } from 'react-icons/md'; import * as CartActions from '../../store/modules/cart/actions'; import { Container, ProductTable, Total } from './styles'; import Tenis from '../../assets/images/tenis.jpg'; function Cart({ cart, removeFronCard }) { return ( PRODUTO QTD SUBTOTAL {cart.map((product) => ( {product.title} {product.priceFormatted}
R$258,80 ))}
TOTAL R$ 1920,28
); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cart: state.cart, }); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => bindActionCreators(CartActions, dispatch); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Cart);
